EmailTemplate.description: followup on lead that has not been managed by DIMC agent
EmailTemplate.name: AP Lead in Queue Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: URGENT: Inquiry in Queue for greater than 7 days
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear DIMC escalation agent,
The following lead : {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName} from {!Lead.Company} has been in the queue {!Lead.Lead_Queue__c} for greater than 7 days. Here is a link to the lead : {!Lead.Link}
Please ensure that a queue member takes ownership of the lead by clicking the "Accept" button and processing the inquiry.
Should you need assistance to do so, please contact your Regional DIMC key user (Kate ) .
Best regards, DIMC Team
